scripts.db:start: docker run -d -p 15432:5432 -e POSTGRES_PASSWORD=postgres -e POSTGRES_DB=postgres --name my_postgres postgres
scripts.db:stop: docker stop my_postgres && docker rm my_postgres
scripts.benchmark: prisma generate --schema=./src/prisma/schema.prisma && npm run drizzle && npm run orange && npm run prisma
scripts.drizzle: npm run drizzle:pool1 && npm run drizzle:pool10
scripts.drizzle:pool1: npm run init && cross-env POOLSIZE=1 tsx ./src/drizzle/benchmark-pg.ts
scripts.drizzle:pool10: npm run init && cross-env POOLSIZE=10 tsx ./src/drizzle/benchmark-pg.ts
scripts.orange: npm run orange:pool1 && npm run orange:pool10
scripts.orange:pool1: npm run init && cross-env POOLSIZE=1 tsx ./src/orange/benchmark-pg.ts
scripts.orange:pool10: npm run init && cross-env POOLSIZE=10 tsx ./src/orange/benchmark-pg.ts
scripts.prisma: npm run prisma:pool1 && npm run prisma:pool10
scripts.prisma:pool1: npm run init && cross-env POOLSIZE=1 tsx ./src/prisma/benchmark-pg.ts
scripts.prisma:pool10: npm run init && cross-env POOLSIZE=10 tsx ./src/prisma/benchmark-pg.ts
